ygData.msgSnippet: Inside the base, the floors shake as the many hits explode on the shields. Computer: Warning, shields dropping to 95%. Automatic defenses online and firing.

Inside the base, the floors shake as the many hits explode on the 
shields.

Computer: Warning, shields dropping to 95%. Automatic defenses online 
and firing.

The six massive double-barreled laser turrets start firing back on any 
target they can pick up. In this case, any pred could be hit.

Tyrael: So soon? Damn you Megatron! You can't even realize when to 
stop! So much the better, I will kill you here and now!

He walks to the exit, two light shards in each hand, his body emitting 
a strong blue aura. He was going to fight and destroy the puny 
renegades.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor::
> 
> 
> "FOR PREDACON'S VICTORY!!!!!!" said Perceptor while he transformed 
to 
> his tank mode and opened fire against the Triped's base
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "x_rauq_x" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> > ooC: Megs said not to attack the Tripred base until they received 
> > word from Flicker that he'd gotten to the Maximal base. Though 
it's 
> > not really important. =p
> > 
> > -- Megatron --
> > 
> > Megatron had been flying hard, and was close behind Skullertron 
and 
> > Wolfenstein. He'd caught up to Proto and Destructor, and he could 
> > see them arriving at the soon-to-be, or the beginning-of-a battle 
> > ground.
> > 
> > "MEGATRON, TERRORIZE."
> > 
> > The Predacon leader's dragon form quickly folds into his menacing 
> > biped form. Plasma cannon and rocket launcher are ready to go.
> > 
> > "Predacon forces, attack the impundent fools' base. DESTROY IT!"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > > : : Skulletron : :
> > > 
> > > Skulletron jumps up and skids to a stop.
> > > 
> > > Skulletron:  Skulletron, terrorize!!!!
> > > 
> > > The rabid, deformed hyena bot transforms to robot mode after 
> > processing his activation code.  His big, slimy tongue, courtesy 
of 
> > Slaughter, emerges and licks his lips.  Skulletron smacks the 
> tongue 
> > lightly, and he draws out his missile gun.
> > > 
> > > Skulletron:  FOR THE PREDACOOOONS!!!
> > > 
> > > Skulletron pulls the trigger on his weapon, and a missile 
pierces 
> > the air and heads at the Tripred base.
